transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Yes. Hi ma'am. Good morning ma'am. Vishal Bhaskar from ma'am IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji boliye sir.
Executive: Yes ma'am. Ma'am actually maine call kiya tha. Aapne na piche hamari executive se baat kari thi.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Kuch aapne feedback share kari thi not satisfied ke taraf se. To mai puch raha tha kuch.
Customer: Not satisfied of course. Of course not satisfied. Kyunki maine IndiaMART se hi dhundh karke ek client ko maine mera maine service diya tha. To waha maine bill will sab bana ke diya tax invoice vagera sab banwa ke diya. To unhone hamara payment nahi kiya. Maine ye complaint kiya tha IndiaMART me to IndiaMART se puch tach to sara kar liya unhone. Unhone kaha bill will bhejo maine sab bhej diya but abhi tak koi solution nahi hua.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: That's why not service satisfied.
Executive: Nahi nahi ma'am. Mai isme batata hu. I think hamari yaha par na jo buyer ya phir koi supplier ke bich me kuch agar aisa kuch problem hota hai na, uske liye hamari separate team hoti hai ma'am. They are working on it ma'am. Aapke pass koi mail aaya hoga ma'am Shivani Saxena ke naam se?
Customer: Sir koi koi mail nahi aaya. Shivani ka to ek bar Aman naam ke bande ne bhi bola ki madam aapne koi mail bhi nahi kiya. Unko bhi response nahi de rahi aur mujhe bhi na koi mail kiya unhone. Na hi WhatsApp pe reply karti aur na hi call uthati hai Shivani madam. Koi call bhi nahi uthati hai aap log kaise bande ko bithaya pata nahi ha. Call bhi nahi uthati hai wo.
Executive: Ma'am mai mai cross check kar leta hu inke sath ma'am agar aisi problem hai.
Customer: Please cross check kijiye. Haan please zarur cross check kijiye aur ispe action lijiye. Kya aap log ki taraf se itna matlab service aisa kyu diya ja raha hai? Kyunki dekhiye package lene ke liye hum har saal package lete hai hum. To hamare liye kuch to karna chahiye na aap logo ko.
Executive: Ma'am hum apni side se har ek possible cheez karte hai ma'am.
Customer: Haan to mujhe wo bata dijiye. Hmm.
Executive: Actual me buyer ke sath kya concern kya hua hai exactly? Aap bataiye mujhe.
Customer: Maine jaise Adani Gujarat me Adani Power Limited Gujarat me humne service ka order liya. Thik hai? Waha se work order vagera sab aa gaya hamare pass. Sari cheeze aa gayi. Humne labour bhej kar ke waha pe kaam kara dedh mahina. Dedh mahina kaam kiya. To uske humne bill banaye. Wo bill ke amount abhi tak hame mile nahi. Unhone diya nahi. Humne itne phone kiye sabko phone kar kar ke hum log thak gaye. But koi response unhone se koi banda nahi de raha hai. Aur abhi ja ke bhi fayda nahi kyuki office to bulayenge nahi office se wo log gayab hi rehte hai. To matlab wo hum logo ko payment nahi dena chah rahe hai wo. Service le liya unhone. Hamare labour ko payment karna hai service le kar ke aur unhone wo hamare phone ka na reply karte hai na jawab dete hai. Aur hamesha aaj kal aaj kal aaj kal kar ke unhone do mahine se hame aaj kal aaj kal kar rahe hai.
Executive: Okay okay. Nisha ma'am mai ek aapse request kar sakta hu ma'am. Ma'am dekho yaha par jo hua uske bare me to mai abhi kuch bol nahi sakta hu. But please aap try kariyega jis bhi buyer se aap IndiaMART pe business kar rahe hai. Please uspe na advance payment ke sath hi aage proceed kariyega ma'am. Ma'am pata hai kyu? Because aap jante hai koi bhi buyer agar mere pass aaya IndiaMART pe. Maine agar aapko unka number diya. Aapne agar unse koi bhi business kiya aur suppose wo buyer agar payment nahi karta. Ma'am jaise abhi aap IndiaMART ke liye negative bol gaye hai ki IndiaMART ne mujhe kya support kiya ma'am. Ma'am mai us buyer ka number aapko provide kar raha hu jiski requirement hamare pass aa rahi hai ma'am. Ma'am mujhe nahi pata ki wo kis tarike ka buyer hai. Uske business karne ka style kya hai, kaise karta hai, advance pay karta hai kaise karta hai ma'am. Isliye hum na apne jitne client hai.
Customer: Service aur service ka paisa to service dene ke baad hi liya jata hai. To please aap dekh lijiye ek bar cross check kijiye uske baad mujhe call kariye wapas.
Executive: Not an issue. Mai ek bari Shivangi se puch leta hu ispe kya update hai. Usse cross check karke mai aapko update karwa deta hu mai. Okay okay thank you sir thank you.
Customer: Okay okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Payment not received from a client. 

- No response from Shivani regarding the issue.

- Dissatisfied with IndiaMART's service.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to cross-check with Shivangi.

- Advised to take advance payment in future.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will update after cross-checking with Shivangi.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, payment, service, follow up
